content.query:
SELECT 
[orderId]
,[uniqueId]
,[id]
,[ean]
,[lockId]
,[quantity]
,[seller]
,[name]
,[refId]
,[price]
,[listPrice]
,[imageUrl]
,[brandName]
,[brandId]
,[raw_data].[vtex_items].[categoriesIds]
,(
    SELECT 
    [namecat]
    FROM [raw_data].[vtex_items_categories] 
    INNER JOIN [raw_data].[vtex_items]
    ON 
    [raw_data].[vtex_items].[orderid] = [raw_data].[vtex_items_categories].[orderid]
    WHERE  [raw_data].[vtex_items_categories].[idcat] = 4
) as [Categorie_1]
,(
    SELECT 
    [namecat]
    FROM [raw_data].[vtex_items_categories] 
    INNER JOIN [raw_data].[vtex_items]
    ON 
    [raw_data].[vtex_items].[orderid] = [raw_data].[vtex_items_categories].[orderid]
    WHERE  [raw_data].[vtex_items_categories].[idcat] = '120' 
) as [Categorie_2]
,(
    SELECT 
    [namecat]
    FROM [raw_data].[vtex_items_categories] 
    INNER JOIN [raw_data].[vtex_items]
    ON 
    [raw_data].[vtex_items].[orderid] = [raw_data].[vtex_items_categories].[orderid]
    WHERE  [raw_data].[vtex_items_categories].[idcat] = 140
) as [Categorie_3]
 
 FROM [raw_data].[vtex_items]
